title: "Complete"

---

When an assignment is done, we call the task complete. This is also true when it comes to a task related to our spiritual growth. In order for us to be “complete” in different tasks on our journey, we must seek the HOLY SPIRIT’s guidance.

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

-   Week 1
    -   2 Corinthians 8:10-11
-   Week 2
    -   James 1:2-4
-   Week 3
    -   Philippians 1:6-7
-   Week 4
    -   James 2: 22-23
